info.name: JCJP Vocab Test Yomigana Disabler (mog86uk)
info.description: The same as turning off "Show Kana" option in Practice, but this works for Lesson tests instead.
info.additionalInfo: This also works for "Weak", "Oblivion" and "New" quizzes, where the option to hide kana doesn't normally exist either. ^^
